page.title: 15 HOO-MILL BOATYARD
page.content: Hoo-Mill Boatyard is situated on the Trent and Mersey Canal at Hoo-Mill Lock. They make barges and narrow boats(the difference being that barges transport goods(coal,pottery,etc.) and a narrow boat carries people). To buy a house boat you would have to pay about $15000 which compares with a small house.Over the past 20 years the amount of boats using the canal has started to increase because people have started to use the canals for leisure. Over the last 2 years however the amount of boats using the canal has decreased. Most people using the canal now use it for leisure although there are still some barges carrying coal,pottery and gravel.Most canals have fish in them and a lot of fishermen use them.
